ComicInfo.Title: The Creature from the Black Bog!; The Ghost Rode a Roller Coaster!; Ed's Young Wife!; The Changeling
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-24 19:36:44. [CVDB76505] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:47:29. [Issue ID 96173]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Steve Ditko,Jack Kirby,Ben Brown,George Roussos,Steve Ditko,Jack Kirby,Ben Brown
ComicInfo.Inker: Steve Ditko,Dick Ayers,David Gantz,Sol Brodsky,George Roussos,Steve Ditko,Dick Ayers,David Gantz,Sol Brodsky
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Creature from the Black Bog!: A retired couple exploring the Everglades comes upon an alien who has been shipwrecked in the bog. In exchange for their help in freeing him, he removes their memories of the incident and makes them younger.
The Ghost Rode a Roller Coaster!: An amusement park owner hires an engineer to design frightening rides and works him to death. The engineer's ghost returns and takes the park owner on a deadly roller coaster ride.
Ed's Young Wife!: A man tries to get his lover's husband out of the way by sawing through the steering column of his car so it will give way on the mountain road, but is surprised to see him when he goes to his lover's abode. The husband tells him he wasn't feeling well that morning so he sent his wife in his place.
The Changeling: A teenager in the future desires to return to Earth despite scientist's warning that over thousands of years humans are no longer adapted to life on Earth.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
